title: "Amazon Unveils New AI Language Model that Beats GPT-3"
excerpt: "Amazon Alexa AI researchers recently unveiled Alexa Teacher Models (AlexaTM 20B) that beats GPT-3 on NLP benchmarks. The 20-billion-parameter sequence-to-sequence (seq2seq) language model showcases SOTA capabilities on few-shot learning."

    excerpt: "Unlike OpenAI’s GPT-3 or Google’s PaLM, which are decoder-only models, AlexaTM 20B is a seq2seq model that contains an encoder and a decoder allowing better performance on machine translation (MT) and summarization."
